allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Phases 1-3: app shell, pipeline, and Go/No-Go scorecard

Phase 1: Foundation — app shell, context, services, models, shared
components, RoleGate/FeatureGate guards, mock data service.

Phase 2: Lead Intake & Pipeline — SearchBar, DataTable, PipelineChart,
ExportButtons, StageIndicator components. Integrated into PipelinePage,
DashboardPage, LeadFormPage, and AppShell.

Phase 3: Go/No-Go Scorecard — 19-criteria dual-column scoring interface
with RBAC-gated columns, qualitative assessment fields, decision flow
\(GO/NO GO/WAIT\), project code validation, stage transitions, PDF/Excel
export, and read-only detail view.

Scorecard criteria use exact HBC Excel template values \(max 92 pts\).
Score thresholds: 69+ Focus All Efforts, 55-68 Pursue/Prioritize,
below 55 Drop.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
